properties.use_case: testing automated and connected driving
properties.motivation: to make driving even safer and more convenient in the future
properties.stakeholder: Volkswagen, the State Office for Roads, Bridges and Waterways, Hamburg Verkehrsanlagen GmbH

properties.use_case: AI detection in tunnels
properties.stakeholder: Hamburg Traffic Control Center

properties.use_case: recording road conditions
properties.stakeholder: Department of Mobility and Environment

properties.use_case: detecting and reporting damaged traffic signs
properties.motivation: make the cityscape cleaner , the streets safer , and service more efficient
properties.stakeholder: Kreislaufwirtschaft Duisburg GmbH,

properties.use_case: AI-powered camera to accelerate bus traffic
properties.motivation: reduce the need for buses to stop as frequently in the immediate vicinity of traffic lights and minimizes the impact on other traffic
properties.stakeholder: RWTH Aachen University, City of Münster

properties.use_case: deriving traffic signs, road damage, markings, and real areas from a digital twin
properties.stakeholder: the city, Ministry of Transport of North Rhine-Westphalia

properties.use_case: traffic-signal time prediction
properties.motivation: efficient and environmentally friendly traffic management
properties.stakeholder: Messe Erfurt GmbH, the city

properties.use_case: AI-powered continuous road condition monitoring system using Herne Waste Management vehicles
properties.stakeholder: City of Herne, EDGITAL GmbH (a subsidiary of HOCHTIEF PPP Solutions GmbH), Entsorgung Herne

properties.use_case: multimodal data (cars, ÖPNV, bikes, pedestrians) feed AI-driven signal control for near-real-time green-time adaptation
properties.motivation: optimize traffic flow and increase the efficiency of infrastructure, as well as to improve road safety for all road users
properties.stakeholder: City of Ingolstadt, IFG Ingolstadt AöR, the Federal Ministry for Digital and Transport

properties.use_case: prediction of on-street parking availability in public road space using a AI model
properties.motivation: cut parking search traffic, save costs on sensors, enable smarter planning (e.g. micromobility, EV charging), and open data for innovation
properties.stakeholder: City of Heilbronn, Fraunhofer IAO

properties.use_case: AI-driven intelligent charging management to match renewable electricity (solar, wind) production with bus charging schedules
properties.motivation: optimal use of renewable energy, reduce CO₂ emissions
properties.stakeholder: Stadtwerke Trier (SWT), Federal Ministry for Digital and Transport (BMDV)

properties.use_case: analyze street surfaces (via images) to detect and classify road defects and assign condition ratings to road segments
properties.motivation: efficiency in road condition assessment and resource planning
properties.stakeholder: Stadt Konstanz, Tiefbauamt, company vialytics

properties.use_case: prediction-based traffic light (pedestrian signal) control using LiDAR + AI to dynamically adapt signal timing
properties.motivation: to reduce waiting times and optimize traffic flow
properties.stakeholder: Stadt Konstanz, Hochschule Technik, Wirtschaft und Gestaltung (HTWG)

properties.use_case: traffic lights equipped with AI that detect cyclists and pedestrians approaching and adjust or extend green phases accordingly
properties.motivation: reduce waiting times and increase safety
properties.stakeholder: Stadt Bocholt, Yunex Traffic

properties.use_case: AI-based automated damage detection and condition assessment of roads and bicycle paths
properties.motivation: reduce manual effort in condition surveys
properties.stakeholder: City of Schwäbisch Gmünd, Baubetriebsamt, vialytics

properties.use_case: equipping garbage trucks with smartphones to capture street images and road surface unevenness during regular routes, to assess road condition
properties.motivation: enable data-based planning, more efficient maintenance and less on-site inspections
properties.stakeholder: City of Menden, mendigital GmbH, municipal waste collection service, Vialytics

properties.use_case: AI-based support for smart parking management
properties.motivation: optimize parking conditions, reduce traffic and emissions
properties.stakeholder: Municipality of Larissa, Flowbird

properties.use_case: Prototype SUV used AI neural nets on-street during the St. Patrick’s Day parade to map the route and classify vehicles, pedestrians, and safe driving paths
properties.motivation: map and understand the parade route
properties.stakeholder: Provizio, prototype Jaguar Land Rover Defender, Seán O’Sullivan, Coláiste Chiaráin

properties.use_case: AI-powered mobile app (“SmooveAppIA”) detects and maps potholes and bumps in real time using smartphone sensors during car trips
properties.motivation: timely and precise road maintenance
properties.stakeholder: Municipio IX of Roma Capitale, Mediavoice Srl

properties.use_case: AI-enabled cameras monitor a multi-level parking structure to detect security issues and anomalies in the parking facility
properties.motivation: increase user safety and proactively monitor facility integrity
properties.stakeholder: AGSM AIM Smart Solutions, Comune di Vicenza

properties.use_case: virtual assistant in the app guides users through public transit choice, parking, and route planning
properties.motivation: personalize navigation and simplify mobility experience
properties.stakeholder: Comune di Lecce, SGM

properties.use_case: optimize bus routes and vehicle management, and analyze vehicular flows, parking states, and environment
properties.motivation: optimize routes and resource use
properties.stakeholder: Comune di Caltanissetta, assessore Ivan Rando

properties.use_case: pilot AI camera counts cyclists at a intersection to generate precise traffic data
properties.motivation: gather reliable, precise information for mobility monitoring
properties.stakeholder: Urząd Miasta Płocka, Yunex

properties.use_case: AI‐enabled camera systems to dynamically regulate traffic lights
properties.motivation: integrate all types of road users dynamically and balance traffic regulation more realistically
properties.stakeholder: Área de Urbanismo, Medio Ambiente y Movilidad, Dirección General de Gestión y Vigilancia de la Circulación

properties.use_case: monitor pedestrian crossings and road markings via AI to detect deterioration of paint markings
properties.motivation: detect deterioration of road markings more effectively and ensure safety of people and vehicles
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Valencia

properties.use_case: using AI-equipped cameras to perform traffic counts, discriminate vehicle trajectories, types of vehicles, and number of pedestrians at crossings
properties.motivation: improve coordination of main urban routes
properties.stakeholder: City of Sevilla

properties.use_case: a virtual security guard to prevent fraud, non-payments, or theft in a ebike and scooter parking hub
properties.motivation: provide safe space for private personal mobility vehicles
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Sevilla, Junta de Andalucía, PCT Cartuja, Endesa, Mimoto Parking, Wise Build

properties.use_case: intelligent cameras for license-plate recognition and traffic regulation using computer vision
properties.motivation: optimize and improve mobility in the city
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Alicante, concejales de Movilidad y de Modernización y Nuevas Tecnologías

properties.use_case: pilot system to control access by automatically reading license plates, vehicle model, color and size to detect unauthorized vehicles
properties.motivation: restrict unauthorized traffic and reinforce road safety in a pedestrian zone
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Elche, concejalía de Servicios Públicos, technical telecommunications section

properties.use_case: monitor traffic, parking availability, air quality, and coordinate responses (e.g. accidents, congestion) via AI and big data
properties.motivation: improve efficiency of traffic management and promote sustainability in mobility
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Almería, Aluvisa

properties.use_case: smart cameras with AI analytics for traffic monitoring (license-plate reading, vehicle classification, color detection) and incident/event detection via a control platform
properties.motivation: increase public safety and optimize response, and better manage traffic resources
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Dos Hermanas, Innovasur, Policía Local

properties.use_case: combining traffic signal control with AI-enabled sensors to monitor vehicle flow, categorize vehicle types, and manage circulation in real time
properties.motivation: regulate mobility more safely and efficiently
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Fuengirola, Vodafone

properties.use_case: using intelligent cameras and AI sensors to monitor traffic, detect zones of high vehicle density, and control traffic in real time
properties.motivation: enable faster municipal action and better responses in traffic control
properties.stakeholder: Ayuntamiento de Estepona, Aplicaciones Tecnológicas Juma S.L

properties.use_case: AI processes live video to classify and count different types of vehicles
properties.motivation: enable efficient, resource-saving traffic data collection with less equipment and personnel
properties.stakeholder: Stadt Winterthur

properties.use_case: AI and digital imaging trial to identify near-miss incidents at a pedestrian crossing in Lambeth
properties.motivation: improve road safety
properties.stakeholder: Transport for London (TfL), Bosch, Daimler, Ford

properties.use_case: AI vision sensors detect near misses to identify collision risk hotspots before accidents occur
properties.motivation: proactively reveal road safety risks before collisions occur
properties.stakeholder: Coventry City Council, West Midlands Combined Authority, Transport for West Midlands (TfWM), VivaCity

properties.use_case: map the road environment and automatically detect defects to support maintenance planning
properties.motivation: identify deteriorating road conditions and optimise surface treatments and maintenance programmes
properties.stakeholder: Milton Keynes City Council

properties.use_case: AI condition surveys to map road surfaces, detect defects, forecast deterioration, and guide maintenance planning
properties.motivation: provide consistent, objective condition data and recommend timely interventions
properties.stakeholder: City of Wolverhampton Council, Department for Transport (DfT), PTS, Vaisala

properties.use_case: AI cameras capture images of passing vehicles to detect seatbelt and mobile phone offences
properties.motivation: help protect road users by identifying dangerous driving behaviours
properties.stakeholder: Plymouth City Council, Devon & Cornwall Police, Acusensus

properties.use_case: AI analyses high-resolution camera imagery to detect and classify road defects
properties.motivation: make defect identification more efficient and enable better planning and value for money
properties.stakeholder: Stoke-on-Trent City Council

properties.use_case: AI-powered road condition survey
properties.stakeholder: City of York Council
